text: The 1987–88 Algerian Championnat National was the 26th season of the Algerian Championnat National since its establishment in 1962. A total of 18 teams contested the league, with EP Sétif as the defending champions, The Championnat started on September 11, 1987 and ended on July 5, 1988. ==Team summaries== === Promotion and relegation === Teams promoted from Algerian Division 2 1987-1988 * US Bel-Abbès * RS Kouba * MO Constantine Teams relegated to Algerian Division 2 1988-1989 * Entente de Sétif * Olympique de Chlef * Jeunesse de Belcourt * Widad de Tlemcen * Flambeau de Skikda ==League table== ==References== ==External links== *1987–88 Algerian Championnat National Algerian Championnat National Championnat National Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 seasons
title: 1987–88 Algerian Championnat National
